gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.fetcher.core

Class Matcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.athenainnovation.imis.fusion.fetcher.core.Matcher

  • public class Matcher
extends Object
    This class is responsible for matching rules against a given dataset and providing metadata relevant to the rule.
    Author:
    Thomas Maroulis

      Matcher(String endpoint, String graph)
      Constructs a new Matcher for a given SPARQL endpoint and graph.

      • Matcher

        public Matcher(String endpoint,
       String graph)
        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new Matcher for a given SPARQL endpoint and graph.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - a SPARQL endpoint for the target dataset
        graph - a graph URI for the target dataset
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a null endpoint is provided

    • Method Detail

      • getRuleGeometryProcessor

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<GeometryProcessor> getRuleGeometryProcessor(String ruleID,
                                                                          RulePattern rulePattern)
        Parses a rule to determine the appropriate GeometryProcessor.
        Parameters:
        ruleID - the ID of the rule to be parsed
        rulePattern - the rule to be parsed
        Returns:
        optional of the appropriate GeometryProcessor for the geometry serialisation specified in the rule or absent if it cannot be determined

      • getRuleMatchCount

        public Integer getRuleMatchCount(String countDistinctQuery)
        Get number of times rule is matched against dataset by executing a COUNT DISTINCT query.
        Parameters:
        countDistinctQuery - query string
        Returns:
        number of times rule has been matched

      • getRuleSampleVariableContent

        public RulePattern getRuleSampleVariableContent(RulePatternParser rulePatternParser)
        Get sample values for the variables specified in the rule by executing a SELECT ... LIMIT 1 query.
        Parameters:
        rulePatternParser - rule pattern parser
        Returns:
        the rule with variable content set

      • getCRSFromContent

        public GeometryCRS getCRSFromContent(RulePattern rulePattern,
                            GeometryProcessor geometryProcessor)
        Parses object variable content in rule to determine matched geometry serialisation CRS.
        Parameters:
        rulePattern - rule pattern
        geometryProcessor - geometryProcessor for the geometry serialisation matched by the rule
        Returns:
        geometry CRS
